videos.description: Officials blow a whistle for a shot clock issue and UConn head coach Dan Hurley is in disbelief when he thinks the call is a Huskies' turnover.
videos.headline: Hurley hyped and confused on sideline

videos.description: Florida State Mfiondu Kabengele drives down the lane and pulls up for a short jumper and a foul.
videos.headline: FSU's Kabengele powers to hoop for and-1

videos.description: Jalen Adams hustles up court and throws an alley-oop pass to Tarin Smith for a two-handed dunk for UConn.
videos.headline: UConn's Adams lobs to Smith for slam

videos.description: Florida State gets a block and Terance Mann catches a pass up ahead for a reverse slam.
videos.headline: FSU's Mann flushes reverse dunk

videos.description: Florida State's Trent Forrest steals a UConn pass and takes it all the way for a ferocious dunk.
videos.headline: FSU's Forrest steals and slams

videos.description: UConn's Alterique Gilbert misses a 3-pointer, but Tarin Smith rises up for a powerful putback dunk.
videos.headline: UConn's Smith throws down putback slam
